      • initField

        public static boolean initField(BlockFieldAnWrapper<? extends ICMLBlock> fieldWrapper,
                                AbstractAnnotateController controller,
                                boolean afterRefPoint)
                         throws InterpssException
        initialize controller field. Blocks after the ref point is init by its y0, those before the ref point and feedback fields are init by its u0
        Parameters:
        fieldWrapper - field to be init
        controller - parent controller
        afterRefPoint - before or after RefPoint
        Throws:
        InterpssException
